name: Artoo & Threepio (V)
Lore: 'Threepio''s extensive experience ''talking'' to the Falcon''s computer allowed him to pilot the freighter while on Coruscant. Artoo, an R-unit droid, provided moral support.',
Text: 'When deployed, may draw top card of Reserve Deck. Unless hit, may re-target a weapon targeting Chewie, Leia, or Luke (of ability < 5) to this droid (targeting may not be canceled). If this droid was just forfeited during opponent''s turn, may take it into hand.',
